title: recordDefs
description: Record framework definitions for a scope.

duplicateWhereBuilderClassName.description: A class for building a where clause for duplicate checking. Should implement Espo\Core\Duplicate\WhereBuilder interface.

defaultsPopulatorClassName.description: Populates default values when creating a record. Should implement Espo\Core\Record\Defaults\Populator. As of v8.2.

readLoaderClassNameList.description: Classes to load additional fields for an entity. Should implement Espo\Core\FieldProcessing\Loader interface.

listLoaderClassNameList.description: Classes to load additional fields for an entity for the list view. Should implement Espo\Core\FieldProcessing\Loader interface.

saverClassNameList.description: Classes to save additional fields. Should implement Espo\Core\FieldProcessing\Saver interface.

selectApplierClassNameList.description: Classes for additional handling of a select query. Use for joining additional fields. Do not use for access control logic. Should implement Espo\Core\Select\Applier\AdditionalApplier interface.

allowed.description: Allows the action for non-object scopes.

implementationClassName.description: A class name, should implement Espo\Core\Action\Action interface.

massActions.description: Mass actions. E.g. update, delete, convertCurrency, follow, unfollow, recalculateFormula.

allowed.description: Allows the action for non-object scopes.

implementationClassName.description: A class name, should implement Espo\Core\MassAction\MassAction interface.

massActionsDisabled.description: Disable mass actions in the back-end.

actionHistoryDisabled.description: Disable Action History processing. As of v8.2.

updateDuplicateCheck.description: If true, then duplicate checking will be processed while updating a record.

forceSelectAllAttributes.description: Always select all attributes when calling find. As of v8.2.

mandatoryAttributeList.description: Mandatory attributes to be selected when calling find. As of v8.2.

duplicateLinkList.description: Links to be copied when duplicating a record. As of v8.2.

relationships.description: Relationship parameters. Key-object pairs, where keys are link names.

countDisabled.description: Disable total count. As of v8.2.

selectAccessControlDisabled.description: Disable access control when listing related records; only access to a parent record will be checked.

linkRequiredAccess.description: Access to a current record that is needed to be able to link and unlink records.

linkRequiredForeignAccess.description: Access to a foreign record that is needed to be able to link and unlink.

linkForeignAccessCheckDisabled.description: Disable foreign record access check when linking.

linkCheckDisabled.description: Disable a link-check functionality when linking through link or link-multiple field.

mandatoryAttributeList.description: Mandatory attributes to be selected when find related. As of v8.2.

massLink.description: Allow mass link. As of v8.2.

linkOnlyNotLinked.description: Allow linking only if a record is not linked with any. As of v8.3.

loadAdditionalFieldsAfterUpdate.description: Load additional fields after update. Needed for cases when additional fields need to be re-loaded since they are not actual after update.

createInputFilterClassNameList.description: Create input filters. Should implement Espo\Core\Record\Input\Filter. As of v8.2.

updateInputFilterClassNameList.description: Update input filters. Should implement Espo\Core\Record\Input\Filter. As of v8.2.

outputFilterClassNameList.description: Output filters. Should implement Espo\Core\Record\Output\Filter. As of v8.2.

beforeReadHookClassNameList.description: Before-read hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\ReadHook interface.

earlyBeforeCreateHookClassNameList.description: Early-before-create hooks. Run before validation. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\CreateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface. As of v9.0.

beforeCreateHookClassNameList.description: Before-create hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\CreateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface.

afterCreateHookClassNameList.description: After-create hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\CreateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface. As of v8.2.

earlyBeforeUpdateHookClassNameList.description: Early-before-update hooks. Run before validation. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\UpdateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface. As of v9.0.

beforeUpdateHookClassNameList.description: Before-update hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\UpdateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface.

afterUpdateHookClassNameList.description: Before-update hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\UpdateHook or Espo\Core\Record\Hook\SaveHook interface. As of v8.2.

beforeDeleteHookClassNameList.description: Before-delete hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\DeleteHook interface.

afterDeleteHookClassNameList.description: Before-delete hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\DeleteHook interface. As of v8.2.

beforeLinkHookClassNameList.description: Before-link hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\LinkHook interface.

beforeUnlinkHookClassNameList.description: Before-unlink hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\UnlinkHook interface.

afterLinkHookClassNameList.description: After-link hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\LinkHook interface. As of v8.2.

afterUnlinkHookClassNameList.description: After-unlink hooks. Should implement the Espo\Core\Record\Hook\UnlinkHook interface. As of v8.2.

deletedRestorerClassName.description: A deleted record restorer. Should implement `Espo\Core\Record\Deleted\Restorer`. As of v9.2.
